item.title: Stop people in castle wars attacking their own teams
item.dc:creator: @Chrisofwow Chrisofwow
item.description:
@Chrisofwow wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:8, topic:262702”]Well, if you did that, then people could have two capes in their inventory.
Chris is fighting Jc.
Chris is wearing cape 1000. Jc is wearing cape 1500.
Chris gets Jc down to no food, in level 35 wild.
Jc switches to cape 1000 so Chris cannot attack him.

I suggest you activate this only in a specific area, and make the cape irremovable while in that area.[/quote]

Yes but then the player can just remove their cape … But yes, i’ve already added the boolean for isincw. I just need to get the capes working first.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 17, 2009, 06:40:14 am[/size][hr][quote=“Chassy13, post:9, topic:262702”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=346917.msg2672107#msg2672107 date=1234874160]
Well, if you did that, then people could have two capes in their inventory.
Chris is fighting Jc.
Chris is wearing cape 1000. Jc is wearing cape 1500.
Chris gets Jc down to no food, in level 35 wild.
Jc switches to cape 1000 so Chris cannot attack him.

I suggest you activate this only in a specific area, and make the cape irremovable while in that area.
[/quote]

Or you could just make it so a player can only have one color of a cape at a time.[/quote]

Thanks for the idea but I really need someone to help me with the question I asked :S

Read full topic

@jc22493 wrote:

Well, if you did that, then people could have two capes in their inventory.
Chris is fighting Jc.
Chris is wearing cape 1000. Jc is wearing cape 1500.
Chris gets Jc down to no food, in level 35 wild.
Jc switches to cape 1000 so Chris cannot attack him.

I suggest you activate this only in a specific area, and make the cape irremovable while in that area.

item.title: Stop people in castle wars attacking their own teams
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

Chrisofwow:

Can someone who isn’t a complete idiot help me please?

lmaoo, no. i mean it.

you have made the code correct i think, but if you cannot attack the opersite side, then change the code to opersite and try it… because then it stops attacking on your team not the other team.

and you are saying that you cannot attack the other team, but you can attack your own team.

			}
			if ((AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4041 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4041)
					&& !isInPitGame()) {
				sM("You Cannot attack your own clan members!");
				faceNPC(32768 + AttackingOn);
				break;
